dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 dataset includes 10 classes, each of which has 6,000 training images, and 1,000 test images. In experiments, 10% training images in each class are taken as validation images. The resolution of images is 32×32.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Y. Le
X. Yang
dcterms:description: TinyImageNet dataset includes 200 classes, each of which has 500 training images, and 50 validation images. In experiments, validation images are taken as test images, and 10% training images in each class are taken as validation images. The resolution of images is 64×64.
dcterms:title: TinyImageNet

dcterms:creator: J. Elson
J. J. Douceur
J. Howell
J. Saul
dcterms:description: Cats-and-Dogs dataset includes 2 classes, each of which has 12,500 images. In experiments, 9,000, 1,000, and 2,500 images in each class are taken as training, validation, and test images, respectively. The resolution of images is resized to 224×224.
dcterms:title: Cats-and-Dogs
